author: crossley
msg: Merged from prior to revision r47207.
The new jxpath caused errors such as:
BROKEN: No pipeline matched request: samples/site:samples/faq

author: leif
msg: Use the 2.1.0 snapshot version of logkit.  The released version closes System.out when Fortress shutsdown.  Bad for the rest of the build output.

author: leif
msg: Fix a problem where the streams opened by SourceUtil.copy were not being closed.  Reported by Vadim Gritsenko.
Also added javadocs describing when streams need to be closed and the fact that calling cancel will close a stream.
